doc:
Lynn Hamilton (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lynn_Hamilton_(actress) 0 Lynn Hamilton (born April 25, 1930) is an American former actress. Making her acting debut in 1959 with a role in John Cassavetes' Shadows, Hamilton is perhaps best known for her role as Donna Harris; Fred's girlfriend later turned fiance on the sitcom Sanford and Son which originally aired from 1972 until 1977. Lynn_Hamilton ( born April_25_,_1930 ) is an_American_former_actress . Making her_acting_debut in 1959 with a_role in John_Cassavetes '_Shadows , Hamilton is_perhaps_best_known for her_role as Donna_Harris ; Fred 's_girlfriend later turned fiance on the_sitcom Sanford_and_Son which originally aired from 1972 until 1977 .
